info.description: API Definition for the A3S. This service allows authentication, authorisation and accounting.
info.title: A3S

parameters.description: Determines whether all entities related to the user are returned.
parameters.name: includeRelations

parameters.description: A search query filter on the User's name. Will apply the search to first names and surname.
parameters.name: filterName

parameters.description: A search query filter on the User's username.
parameters.name: filterUsername

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append '_desc' after a field to indicate descending order. Supported fields. 'name', 'surname', 'username'.
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden -  You are not authorized to access the list of users.
Forbidden - Not authorized to create a user.

404.description: Related user entity (such as role or team) not found.

422.description: Non-Processible entity. The request was correctly structured, but some business rules were violated, preventing the user creation.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to delete users.
Forbidden - You are not authorized to access this user.

get.summary: Get a user by its UUID.

put.description: Update a user and its associations to teams and roles.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to update users.

404.description: User or related entity not found.

422.description: Non-Processible entity. The request was correctly structured, but some business rules were violated, preventing the user update.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized update user passwords.

parameters.description: A search query filter on the User profile's name.
parameters.name: filterName

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append desc after a field to indicate descending order.
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the list of user profiles for this user.

get.summary: Search a user for all their profiles.

post.description: Create a new user profile for a user. UUID not required in request body.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized create user profiles.

parameters.description: The UUID of the user profile.
parameters.name: profileId

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to delete user profiles.

404.description: User or user profile not found.

parameters.description: The UUID of the user profile.
parameters.name: profileId

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access this user's profile.

404.description: User or user profile not found.

get.summary: Get a user's profile by its UUID.

parameters.description: The UUID of the user profile.
parameters.name: profileId

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized update user profiles.

404.description: User or user profile not found.

delete.description: Removes two-factor authentication for a user.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to remove two-factor authentication.

delete.summary: Removes two-factor authentication for a user, as well as any registered devices and methods.

200.description: Successful. OTP validation ran successfully. Check Success parameter and results for more information.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to validate two-factor authentication OTP's.

parameters.description: Determines whether the entities related to the role are returned.
parameters.name: includeRelations

parameters.description: A search query filter on the role's name.
parameters.name: filterName

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append '_desc' after a field to indicate descending order. Supported fields. 'name'.
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the list of roles.
Forbidden - Not authorized to create a Role.

422.description: Non-Processible Entity. The request was correctly structured, but some business rules were violated, preventing the creation of the role.

get.description: Get a role by its UUID.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access this role.

put.description: Update a role by its UUID.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to update a role.

422.description: Non-Processible Entity. The request was correctly structured, but some business rules were violated, preventing the updating of the role.

parameters.description: Determines whether the team's related entities will be returned.
parameters.name: includeRelations

parameters.description: A search query filter on the team's name.
parameters.name: filterName

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append '_desc' after a field to indicate descending order. Supported fields. 'name'.
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the list of teams.
Forbidden - You are not authorized to create the team.

422.description: Non-Processible Entity. The request was correctly structured, but some business rules were violated, preventing the creation of the team.

get.description: Get a team by its UUID.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the team.

put.description: Update a team by its UUID.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to update the team.

422.description: Non-Processible Entity - The requests was correctly structured, but some business rules were violated, preventing the update.

parameters.description: A search query filter on the name of the client.
parameters.name: filterName

parameters.description: A search query filter on the client ID of the client.
parameters.name: filterClientId

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append '_desc' after a field to indicate descending order.  Supported fields. 'name', 'clientId'
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the list of clients.

get.description: Get a client by its client Id.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the client.

parameters.description: A search query filter on the application's name.
parameters.name: filterName

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append '_desc' after a field to indicate descending order. Supported fields. 'name'.
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the list of applications.

parameters.description: A search query filter on the permission's name.
parameters.name: filterName

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append '_desc' after a field to indicate descending order. Supported fields. 'name'.
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the list of permissions.

get.description: Get a permission by its UUID.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the permission.

get.description: Search for terms of service entries.

parameters.description: Determines whether the related entities, such as teams and which users accepted the agreement, are returned.
parameters.name: includeRelations

parameters.description: A search query filter on the agreement's name.
parameters.name: filterAgreementName

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append '_desc' after a field to indicate descending order. Supported fields. 'agreementName'.
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the list of terms of service entries.

get.summary: Search for terms of service entries.

post.description: Create a new terms of service entry.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to create terms of service entries.

post.summary: Create a new terms of service entry.

delete.description: Deletes a terms of service entry from A3S.

parameters.description: The UUID of the terms of service entry to delete.
parameters.name: termsOfServiceId

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to delete terms of service entry.

404.description: Terms of service entry not found.

422.description: Terms of service entry cannot be deleted.

delete.summary: Delete a terms of service entry.

get.description: Get a terms of service entry by its UUID.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the terms of service entry.

404.description: Terms of service entry not found.

get.summary: Get a terms of service entry.

parameters.description: Determines whether related entities, such as any associated permissions, are returned.
parameters.name: includeRelations

parameters.description: A search query filter on the name of the function.
parameters.name: filterName

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append '_desc' after a field to indicate descending order.  Supported fields. 'name'.
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the list of functions.
Forbidden - You are not authorized to create functions.

404.description: Function related entity (such as permissions) not found.

parameters.description: The UUID of the function to delete.
parameters.name: functionId

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to delete functions.

get.description: Get a function by its UUID.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the function.

put.description: Update a function by its UUID.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to update the function.

parameters.description: Determines whether related entities, such as any associated permissions, are returned.
parameters.name: includeRelations

parameters.description: A search query filter on the application function name.
parameters.name: filterName

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append '_desc' after a field to indicate descending order. Supported fields. 'name'.
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the list of functions.

get.description: Returns the entire security contract for the current state of A3S.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the security contract.

put.description: Idempotently applies a security contract definition to the A3S instance.

422.description: Non-Processible Entity - The security contract was correctly structured, but there are business rule or constraint violations, preventing it from being applied.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to apply Security Contracts.

put.summary: Idempotently applies a security contract definition.

put.description: Validates a security contract by doing a dry run. Attempts to process the entire security contract, even if errors are detected, in order to repoert as many errors as possible.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to validate Security Contracts.

put.summary: Validates a security contract by doing a dry run.

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append desc after a field to indicate descending order.
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the list of LDAP Authentication modes.

404.description: LDAP Authentication mode list not found.

post.description: Create a new LDAP Authentication Mode.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to create a LDAP Authentication Mode.

422.description: Non-Processible request. The request was correctly structured but some business rules were violated, preventing the creation of the LDAP Authentication Mode.

delete.description: Deletes a LDAP Authentication Mode, but only if there are no users currently using this Authentication Mode.

parameters.description: The UUID of the LDAP Authentication Mode.
parameters.name: ldapAuthenticationModeId

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to delete LDAP Authentication Modes.

422.description: Non-Processible request. Most likely returned as a result of there still being users assigned to the LDAP Auth Mode that a deletion attempt was made for.

get.description: Get a ldapAuthenticationMode by its UUID

parameters.description: The UUID of the LDAP Authentication Mode.
parameters.name: ldapAuthenticationModeId

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to read LDAP Authentication Modes.

put.description: Update a LDAP Authentication Mode by its UUID.

parameters.description: The UUID of the LDAP Authentication Mode.
parameters.name: ldapAuthenticationModeId

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to update LDAP Authentication Modes.

422.description: Non-Processible request. The request was correctly structured but some business rules were violated, preventing the update of the LDAP Authentication Mode.

200.description: Successful. LDAP Authentication Model successfully tested. Check Success parameter and results for more information.

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to test a LDAP Authentication Mode.

parameters.description: a comma separated list of fields in their sort order. Ascending order is assumed. Append desc after a field to indicate descending order.
parameters.name: orderBy

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to access the list of Sub Realms.
Forbidden - Not authorized to create a Sub-Realm.

422.description: Non-Processible request. The request was correctly structured but some business rules were violated, preventing the creation of the Sub-Realm.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to delete Sub-Realms.

422.description: Non-Processible request. Usually returned when the request is correctly structured but some business rules have been violated.

get.description: Get a Sub-Realm by its UUID.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to read Sub-Realms.

put.description: Update a Sub-Realm by its UUID.

403.description: Forbidden - You are not authorized to update Sub-Realms.

422.description: Non-Processible request. The request was correctly structured but some business rules were violated, preventing the update of the Sub-Realm.

Role.description: A Role within A3S. Roles can have functions assigned to them. Roles can be assigned to users.

subRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

items.description: The UUIDS of the functions assigned to this role.

roleIds.description: The UUIDs of the child roles attached to the role.

RoleSubmit.description: Model used to create or update a Role. The role can be optionally associated with a sub-realm by specifying the 'subRealmId' of the sub-realm.

subRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

roleIds.description: The UUIDs of the child roles attached to the role.

items.description: The UUIDS of the functions assigned to this role.

TermsOfService.description: Models a terms of service agreement that needs to be agreed to by a user on login.

teamIds.description: Teams linked to this terms of service entry.

acceptedUserIds.description: A list of User Id's that have accepted this terms of service entry.

subRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

TermsOfServiceListItem.description: Models a terms of service agreement returned inside lists.

teamIds.description: Teams linked to this terms of service entry.

acceptedUserIds.description: A list of User Id's that have accepted this terms of service entry.

subRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

TermsOfServiceSubmit.description: Models a terms of service agreement that needs to be agreed to by a user on login. Used to create or update a terms of service agreement. UUID is required when updating a terms of service agreement. Can be optionally associated with a sub-realm by specifying the 'subRealmId' of the sub-realm.

subRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

Function.description: A Function - A collection of permissions to denote a piece of functionality in an application. Must be assigned to an application. May optionally be associated with a sub-realm by specifying a 'subRealmId'.

subRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

FunctionSubmit.description: Model used to create an new function or update an existing Function. May optionally be associated with a sub-realm by specifying a 'subRealmId'.

description.description: A brief description of the function.

subRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

permissions.description: A list of permission UUIDs that are to be added to the function.

ApplicationFunctionId.description: The UUID of an application function.

ApplicationFunction.description: An Application Function - a collection of permissions to denote a piece of functionality in an application. Defined by micro-services only.

uuid.description: The UUID of an application function.

name.description: The name of the application function.

description.description: A brief description of the application function.

permissions.description: An array of permissions that the application function is composed of.

isDeleted.description: True if this user is considered deleted.

UserSubmit.description: Model used to create or update a user.

password.description: A plain text password field used to create or update the user password. Required for create. If omitted on update, password will not be affected.

UserPasswordChangeSubmit.description: Used to change a user's password.

UserProfileSubmit.description: Models a user profile, which enables context based access for the same user identity, when creating or updating a user profile.

name.description: The name of the user profile. This must be unique per user.

description.description: A brief description of a user profile and it's intent.

subRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

UserProfile.description: Models a user profile, which enables context based access for the same user identity.

uuid.description: The unique UUID for a user profile.

name.description: The name of the user profile. This must be unique per user.

description.description: A brief description of a user profile and it's intent.

subRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

UserProfileId.description: The unique UUID for a user profile.

userIds.description: The UUIDs of the users attached to the team

dataPolicyIds.description: The ID's of the application data policies that are applied to this team.

subRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

TeamSubmit.description: Model used for creating or updating a team. Team can be optionally associated with a sub-realm by specifying the 'subRealmId' of the sub-realm.

teamIds.description: The UUIDs of the child teams (in the case of a compound team)

dataPolicyIds.description: The application data policies that are applied to this team.

subRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

Oauth2ClientSubmit.description: Models a client definition required to create or update an Oauth2 or OpenID Connect client.

clientId.description: The unique ID of the client.

name.description: Client display name. Used for logging and the consent screen.

allowedGrantTypes.description: The Oauth2 grant types that the client will be permitted to use.

redirectUris.description: Specifies the allowed URIs to return tokens or authorisation codes to.

allowedCorsOrigins.description: Sets the allowed CORS origins for JavaScript clients.

postLogoutRedirectUris.description: Specifies the allowed URIs to redirect to after logout.

allowedScopes.description: Specifies the scopes that the client is allowed to access. If empty, the client cannot access any scopes.

clientSecrets.description: Client secrets for flows (grant types) that require one.

hashedClientSecrets.description: An optional array containing already hashed client secrets for flows (grant types) that require one. If used, the clientSecrets will be ignored.

allowedOfflineAccess.description: Defines whether offline access with refresh tokens is permitted for this client.

accessTokenLifetime.description: The amount of time that access tokens issued for this client will be valid (in seconds) for. Default is 3600.

identityTokenLifetime.description: The amount of time that ID tokens issued for this client will be valid (in seconds) for. Default is 3600.

Oauth2Client.description: Models an Oauth2 or OpenID Connect client.

clientId.description: The unique ID of the client.

name.description: Client display name. Used for logging and the consent screen.

allowedGrantTypes.description: The Oauth2 grant types that the client will be permitted to use.

redirectUris.description: Specifies the allowed URIs to return tokens or authorisation codes to.

allowedCorsOrigins.description: Sets the allowed CORS origins for JavaScript clients.

postLogoutRedirectUris.description: Specifies the allowed URIs to redirect to after logout.

allowedScopes.description: Specifies the scopes that the client is allowed to access. If empty, the client cannot access any scopes.

allowedOfflineAccess.description: Defines whether offline access with refresh tokens is permitted for this client.

name.description: The name of the application permission.

description.description: A description of the application permission.

SecurityContractFunction.description: Models an application's functions. These contain permissions.

name.description: The name of the application function.

description.description: A description of the application function.

SecurityContractApplication.description: Models an application's functions and the corresponding permissions.

fullname.description: The name of the application function.

SecurityContractApplicationDataPolicy.description: Models an applications data policy with the context of security contracts.

name.description: The name of the application data policy.

description.description: A description of the application data policy.

SecurityContractDefaultConfigurationRole.description: Models a role definition within the roles section of the default configuration.

functions.description: An array of all the function names that are to be added to the role. The functions must already exist or be defined in other sections of the security contract.

roles.description: An array of all the child roles that are to be added to the role. The roles must already exist or be defined in other sections of the security contract.

SecurityContractDefaultConfigurationUser.description: Models a default user definition within a default configuration.

uuid.description: The unique Id of the user.

hashedPassword.description: An optional field containing the user's salted and hashed password. If used, the password field will be ignored.

isDeleted.description: True if this user is considered deleted.

deletedTime.description: Populated with user delete date and time.

avatar.description: The user's avatar image in base64 format

ldapAuthenticationMode.description: The user's linked LDAP Authentication Mode name, if applicable

roles.description: An array of all the role names that are to be added to the user. The user must already exist or be defined in other sections of the security contract.

SecurityContractDefaultConfigurationLdap.description: An LdapAttributeLink - A LDAP attribute link definition
Model a default LDAP Authentication Mode

ldapAttributes.description: A list of LDAP attribute to user field mappings

SecurityContractDefaultConfigurationTeam.description: Models a default team definition within a default configuration.

uuid.description: The unique Id of the team.

users.description: An array of all the user names that are to be added to the team. The user must already exist or be defined in other sections of the security contract.

teams.description: An array of all the teams that are to be added to the team. The teams must already exist or be defined in other sections of the security contract.

dataPolicies.description: An array of application data policy names that are to be applied to the team.

name.description: The name of the application that defaults are being configured for.

SecurityContractDefaultConfigurationFunc.description: Models a section of the default configuration for the creation of default functions.

permissions.description: A list of permissions to add to the function.

SecurityContractDefaultConfiguration.description: Models the default configuration section of a security contract.

name.description: The name of the default configuration.

SecurityContractValidationResult.description: Models the result of a security contract dry run validation.

SecurityContractValidationError.description: Models an individual validation error that may be returned when performing a security contract validation request.

SecurityContractValidationWarning.description: Models an individual validation warning that may be returned when performing a security contract validation request.

UserFieldType.description: Enumeration to describe with what user field you're busy with

LdapAttributeLink.description: An LdapAttributeLink - A LDAP attribute link definition

LdapAuthenticationMode.description: An LdapAuthenticationMode - An LDAP connection definition

ldapAttributes.description: A list of LDAP attribute to user field mappings

LdapAuthenticationModeSubmit.description: Create a new or update an existing LdapAuthenticationMode

ldapAttributes.description: A list of LDAP attribute to user field mappings

TwoFactorAuthOTP.description: A OTP for a specific user.

name.description: The name of the application data policy.

description.description: A description of the application data policy.

SubRealmId.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

uuid.description: The UUID identifier for a sub-realm.

permissions.description: A list of all the permissions that are available within the sub-realm.

applicationDataPolicies.description: A list of all the application data policies that are available within the sub-realm.

permissionIds.description: A list of all the permission IDs for the permissions that are to be available within the sub-realm.

applicationDataPolicyIds.description: A list of all the application data policy IDs for the application data policies that are to be available within the sub-realm.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response object to give more info with HTTP status code

PaginationHeaderResponse.description: This is the standard response for requests that have paginated collections

total.description: The total number of pages in the result set

count.description: The total number of results in the result set

size.description: The number items to include in a page of results. The page size for the result set

current.description: The position of the page in the paged result set that is being returned

first.description: The link to the first page of results containing [size] results. This link includes the page, size, filter, orderBy and fields query parameters.

last.description: The link to the last page of results containing [size] results. This link includes the page, size, filter, orderBy and fields query parameters.

prev.description: The link to the previous page of results containing [size] results. This link includes the page, size, filter, orderBy and fields query parameters. If this is the first page in the result set then this will be [null].

next.description: The link to the next page of results containing [size] results. This link includes the page, size, filter, orderBy and fields query parameters. If this is the last page in the result set then this will be [null].
